messages.subject: Poll results for SHQ
messages.msgSnippet: The following SHQ poll is now closed.  Here are the final results: POLL QUESTION: The SHQ was originally set up with the purpose of exploring and celebrating
messages.messageBody:
The following SHQ poll is now closed. Here are the
final results:


POLL QUESTION: The SHQ was originally set up with the
purpose of exploring and celebrating
the lives of the men of the
Shinsengumi. Do you feel the group is
still living up to this goal?

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Yes, 8 votes, 72.73%
- No, 3 votes, 27.27%



For more information about this group, please visit
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ

For help with Yahoo! Groups, please visit
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/

messages.messageBody:
The following SHQ poll is now closed. Here are the
final results:


POLL QUESTION: What did you join the SHQ to learn
about?

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- The Shinsengumi., 8 votes, 66.67%
- The Bakumatsu era., 3 votes, 25.00%
- Japanese history in general., 1 votes, 8.33%
- Japan in general., 0 votes, 0.00%
- Other, 0 votes, 0.00%

messages.messageBody:
The following SHQ poll is now closed. Here are the
final results:


POLL QUESTION: Do you feel the majority of the group
posts are relevant to your
understanding of the Shinsengumi?

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Yes, it's all relevant., 3 votes, 27.27%
- Most of the post are relevant., 5 votes, 45.45%
- A few of the post are relevant, but most are not., 2 votes, 18.18%
- No, most of the posts are not relevant., 1 votes, 9.09%



For more information about this group, please visit
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ

For help with Yahoo! Groups, please visit
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/

- Sometimes, but not often enough., 2 votes, 22.22%
